department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Audit services for recipient-contribution agreement audits
full_summary:
===============

### Announcement Notice

#### Reference

*   Notice Number: WS3774799131-Doc3779259822
*   Solicitation Number: WS3774799131
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Publication Date: 2023-03-07
*   Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-14 14:00:00

#### Tender Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) under the category of Services (SRV) on March 7, 2023. 

#### Background

The contract involves the provision of audit services for the Department of Indigenous Services (ISC) and other entities.

#### Goods and Services Description

UNSpsc: 84111600
Auditor services

#### Procurement Process

*   Method: Competitively selected tendering
*   Notice Type: RFP against Supply Arrangement
*   Criteres Selection: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Trade Agreements

This invitation for bid is open to suppliers from Canada and its partner countries as stipulated in several international trade agreements such as the Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, and the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

#### Contact Information

*   Stephane Beaudry, Department of Public Works and Government Services
*   Email: stephane.beaudry@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
